name: MET Communications GmbH
goal:
MET Communications GmbH was founded in the year 2002. It is located in Bad Homburg v. d. H. in the FrankfurtRheinMain region right in the centre of Germany.

MET Communications offers its services to customers in the telecommunications, IT, automotive, hightech and chemical industries as well as in the financial services, media, and Internet sectors. We focus on supporting the development of new businesses, emerging from converging technologies in globalizing markets, through engineering of efficient processes.


In order to continually expand our core competencies, we take part in international research and development projects and initiatives of the European Commission within the EU RTD Framework Programs. We closely cooperate with academic and industrial partners in Germany, Europe and beyond.
euInitiatives: Horizon 2020: Software Technologies, Next Generation Internet, Internet of Things, Cloud Computing
